about.title: Professional Background
about.p1: I am a dedicated System Administrator and IT Infrastructure with a Diploma in Computer Science and a strong foundation in enterprise-level IT operations. With years of hands-on experience managing complex server environments, networking infrastructures, and cloud services, I deliver reliable and secure IT solutions to clients locally and internationally.
about.p2: As a Microsoft-certified professional holding MCSA, MCITP, MCP, and MCTS credentials, I bring proven expertise in Windows Server administration, Active Directory management, and Microsoft 365 cloud services. My approach combines technical precision with a deep understanding of business needs.
about.p3: I also specialize in modern web development, crafting professional websites using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Whether on-site or remote, I am committed to delivering enterprise-grade solutions that drive real results.
